rows.label: qst650514_msg0001
rows.name:
We're in the deepest part of Elpys
Great Hall... The Vault of Heroes.

rows.label: qst650514_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm finding it incredible that such wide,
open spaces could stretch inside a
Divine Beast... Inside a living creature.

rows.label: qst650514_msg0003
rows.name:
Quite! Though we Divine Beasts may not even
be conscious of it ourselves.

rows.label: qst650514_msg0004
qst650514_msg0005
rows.name:
That's taking "insensitive" to a whole
new level, eh, Gramps?

rows.label: qst650514_msg0006
rows.name: There's cheeky, and then there's rude!

rows.label: qst650514_msg0007
rows.name: Hah... It brings me back...

rows.label: qst650514_msg0008
rows.name:
Mira's got its share of mysterious
ruins too, all built by unknown hands.

rows.label: qst650514_msg0009
rows.name:
Yeah, I don't think anyone knows who
built all these ones either...

rows.label: qst650514_msg0010
rows.name:
Well, the Vault of Heroes being 
a notable exception, I guess.

rows.label: qst650514_msg0011
rows.name: Oh, is that right?

rows.label: qst650514_msg0012
rows.name:
Indeed. This place is dedicated to
Adel, a hero from the days of yore.

rows.label: qst650514_msg0013
rows.name:
He fought a great battle to save people,
then sealed his power away here and
disappeared, who knows where...

rows.label: qst650514_msg0014
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]A hero, huh...?

rows.label: qst650514_msg0015
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]That's what we in NLA called the one
who gave their life to save the people
of the White Whale...

rows.label: qst650514_msg0016
rows.name:
You used to be Adel's Blade,
right, Hikari?

rows.label: qst650514_msg0017
rows.name: Yeah, five hundred years ago...

rows.label: qst650514_msg0018
rows.name:
Though I've slept through most of the
intervening years, so it feels much more
recent that that.

rows.label: qst650514_msg0019
rows.name: What? Is there something on my face?

rows.label: qst650514_msg0020
rows.name:
So you used to be a hero's partner, too.
You should cherish those memories
while they last.

rows.label: qst650514_msg0021
rows.name: Did you not hear what I just said?

rows.label: qst650514_msg0022
rows.name:
To me it feels like it happened last
month, so it doesn't exactly fall under
"memories to cherish" or "used to"...

rows.label: qst650514_msg0023
rows.name: ...Is that right...? *glare*

rows.label: qst650514_msg0024
rows.name:
All right, all right!
I'll cherish them, OK?!

rows.label: qst650514_msg0025
rows.name:
And in any case, isn't it more important
for me to make good memories with my
current Driver...? ...Maybe...?

rows.label: qst650514_msg0026
rows.name: I don't think that's what Elma's saying.

rows.label: qst650514_msg0027
rows.name: What is she saying, then?

rows.label: qst650514_msg0028
rows.name:
The ruins found on Mira or on Alst
are like those worlds' memories.

rows.label: qst650514_msg0029
rows.name:
I'm saying you don't have to deny your
past to live in the present. We should
move ahead, make memories as we go.

rows.label: qst650514_msg0030
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]I think...he...thinks so too.
